function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of biological testing with sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disinfection process and handling of sars-cov-2","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling of infectious materials","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Swift and dramatic inactivation of sars-cov-2 by the cu 2 o/pu coating, reducing the viral titer by 99.9% in 1 hour.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential release of sars-cov-2 virus from uncoated samples in the built environment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Research involving viral titers may pose a risk of accidental exposure and transmission of the virus.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of affordable housing and economic hardship leading to eviction and housing displacement","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disproportionate economic hardship and impacts of the virus on low-income and minority communities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Association between housing displacement and increased covid-19 infection and mortality rates","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Eviction leading to overcrowding and homelessness","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transiency and overcrowding facilitate covid-19 transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Evictions and housing displacement leading to increased crowding in residential environments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Residential crowding and increased contact driving the spread of infectious respiratory illnesses","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowding increasing the spread of respiratory infectious diseases in homeless shelters and public facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased risk of covid-19 transmission in transient housing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Weakened immune system due to stress from eviction threat","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lower access to covid-19 testing post-eviction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Eviction leading to lower access to covid-19 testing and medical attention","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased access to primary and specialty medical care due to eviction","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Eviction amplifying the individual risk of covid-19 complications and mortality","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Eviction and housing instability associated with comorbidities and mental health conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High healthcare costs associated with eviction increasing the likelihood of future evictions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traumatizing effect of eviction on children","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health risks associated with eviction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Racial disparities in eviction risk during covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher eviction rates for black and non-white households","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Racial wealth gap and lack of emergency funds","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disproportionate impact of covid-19 on people of color","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unequal death rates for different racial and ethnic groups due to covid-19 disparities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to social distance in low-wage jobs and crowded living conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Repetitive exposure to racism leading to health deterioration and chronic conditions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Eviction filings spreading covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Property owners using eviction as rent collection tool","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Evictions for small amounts of money","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of legal protections and support for tenants","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased covid-19 transmission due to lifting eviction moratoria","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Excess infections due to backlog of cases and economic duress","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of access to legal representation in eviction cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of health care access and medical debt","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased housing precarity among low-income populations and people of change","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
